bibl.title: The Face of Alexandria - The Face of Africa?

series.title: Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications.

bibl.note: The history of the elephant-scalp headdress found on coins from Ptolemy I to Hadrian and later.
MARITZ Jessie, The Face of Alexandria - The Face of Africa?
Anthony HIRST and Michael SILK (Edd.), Alexandria, Real and Imagined = Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications. 5 (Aldershot, 2004) pp. 41-66, 9 reproductions de monnaies.
